name: NETSMART - ANONYMI EMPORIKI ETAIRIA ANAPTYXIS KAI DIADOSIS YPIRESION KAI PROIONTON SE TOMEIS YPSILIS TECHNOLOGIAS
goal: NetSmart S.A as an organization and its CEO Eleftherios Leontaridis as a standalone consultant aim to provide services to public and/or private entities in order to support pan-European initiatives such as Large Scale Pilot projects, applications of the Connecting Europe facility and other similar initiatives, focusing on, but not limited to, the domains of eProcurement, eHealth, eID, Trust and Security, Business Information Exchange and more generally interoperability standards, solutions and governance models in eGovernment and eBusiness..
interests: Enterprise, Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
1. Participation to the Multi-Stakeholder Expert group on eProxurement (EXEP), leveraging the experience of Mr. Leontaridis in the e-SENS and PEPPOL Large Scale Projects and his involvement with the OpenPEPPOL AISBL as the Executive Support Officer, part of the Operating Office.

2. Participation to the Stakeholder Communities operating under the CEF-Telecom Programme, focusing on the eDelivery, eID, eProcurement and eHealth DSIs

3. Any other initiatives implementing the goals of the Digital Single Market
